src_text: Fulufulu.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Mashumele ya zwa Fulufulu, ngeno nga thungo tshi khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuleme vhuhulwane vhukuma vhune ha kha ḓi vha hone kha sisṱeme ya lushaka ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ekuqalisweni koHlelo Lwezamandla, kanti liyazibona izingqinamba ezilokhu zikhona eziphazamisa isizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke.

src_text: Zwenezwi musi shango ḽi tshi khou dzhena kha khalaṅwaha ya Vhuriha, Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa ha Khonṱhiraka ya ṋetshedza muḓagasi wa 400 megawatsi (MW) dza ḓadzisa nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṋetshedzo yo Linganaho (Standard Offer Programme) dzine dza ḓo thoma vha hone kha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi phanḓa ha musi ṅwedzi wa Shundunthule 2023 tshi fhela..

Nga nnḓa ha izwo, Muhasho wa Mutakalo wo ṱalusa zwibadela zwa 213 sa zwone zwine zwa tea sa kwamea nga mafhungo u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, hune zwibadela zwi linganaho 76 kha zwenezwi, zwa vha uri zwo no ḓi thoma sa kwamea nga uhu khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana ngeno hu na uri mushumo wa engedza zwiṅwe zwibadela zwi linganaho 46 kha mutevhe wa izwo zwine zwa si tee kwamea nga izwo zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi tsini na khunyeledzwa..
tgt_text: Njengoba izwe lingena esikhathini saseBusika, iKhabhinethi lamukele ukuphothulwa kweNkontileka yama-400 megawatts (MW) kagesi owengeziwe ngohlelo lwe-Standard Offer Programme oluzotholakala ngobuchwepheshe ngaphambi kokuphela kukaNhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza zwa rwelwa ṱari ha Energy One-Stop Shop zwine zwa khou ḓo vha hone hu si kale nga ḽa 31 Shundunthule 2023 nga vha Invest SA itela tshimbidza mafhungo zwa milayo ine ya ḓo thusa khamphani ntswa dza bveledza muḓagasi itela uri na dzone dzi thome shuma nga ṱavhanya..

Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho fhaḽa kha Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile hu tshi itelwa vhuedzedzwa hafhu ha muḓagasi linganaho 3 200 MW, kha yunithi dza 1, 2, 3 na 5, murahu kha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka mafheloni ṅwaha wa..
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, uMnyango Wezempilo usukhombe izibhedlela ezingama-213 okufanele zingacinyelwa ugesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ezingama-76 zazo esezivele zingacinyelwa nosekuzokwengezwa ezinye izibhedlela ezingama-46 ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo kwamea nga zwiito zwa phaḓaladzwa ha mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho zwine zwa khou bvela phanḓa, hu tshi khou shumiswa nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano hune khadzo ha khou ambiwa zwauri hu si kale hu khou ḓo vha na wa tshoṱhe ha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka, zwine ha khou pfala uri zwi ḓo fhedza zwo vhanga dzima tshoṱhe ha muḓagasi shango ḽoṱhe.
Eskom yo fulufhedzisa muvhuso uri hu na pulane dzi re hone kha sisṱeme yavho dza thivhela uri hu si vhe na dzima lwa tshoṱhe ha muḓagasi kha shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lamukela ukwethulwa osekusemome kwe-Energy One-Stop Shop mhla wama-31 kuNhlaba 2023 ye-Invest SA okuhloswe ngako ukusheshisa izinqubo zokulawula ezizosiza izinkampani ezintsha eziphehla ugesi ukuthi nazo zibe yingxenye..

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela khuwelelo kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhulunga muḓagasi.
tgt_text: Liphawule inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe eSiteshini Sikagesi iKusile yokubuyisa ugesi oyizi-3 200 MW, kumayunithi 1, 2, 3 no-5 kwisizinda sikazwelonke uma kuphela owezi-..

src_text: Tshipikwa tshihulwane ndi vhulunga muḓagasi linganaho 1 000 MW ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe, zwine hezwi zwa lingana na vhulunga luṱa lwoṱhe lwa thoma lwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhathazekile ngezindaba ezingamampunge ezilokhu ziqhubeka zizungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zokuthi maduze-nje isizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke sizowa lokho okuzoholela ebumnyameni ezweni lonke.

src_text: Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi, Dokotela Vho Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, vha ḓo ḓivhadza shango nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Mashumele ya zwa Fulufulu nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023, musi vha tshi khou amba na vhoramafhungo.
tgt_text: U-Eskom uqinisekise uhulumeni ngezinhlelo ezibekiwe zokuvikela uhlelo lokusebenza lokugwema ubumnyama kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Mutakalo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaphinda licela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokonga ugesi.

src_text: Muvhuso wo vhumba komiti ya shuma ya zwa thekiniki, ine ya khou langwa nga Muhasho wa Mutakalo wa Lushaka, nga murahu ha musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha vhulwadze ha Khoḽera ngei Hammanskraal kha Ḓorobo khulwane ya Tshwane, vhune ho no vhulaha vhathu vha swikaho 15 swika zwino, nga ḽa 24 Shundunthule..
tgt_text: Okuhlosiwe ukonga okungenani i-1 000 MW nsuku zonke, okulingana nokonga isigaba esisodwa sokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga usuku ngalunye.

src_text: Hu na mushumo muhulwane re kati zwazwino wa ita ndingo kha zwiko zwoṱhe zwine zwa nga vha zwi zwone zwo ḓisaho tshikafhadzo iyi, zwi nga vha zwiko zwa maḓi, maḽori u ṋetshedza maḓi, dzibommbi na tshiimiswa tsha Mishumo ya Kunakisa Maḓi Mashika tsha Rooiwal (WWTW) swika zwino hu athu wanala vhuṱanzi vhu sumbaho uri ho wanala bakhitheria ya khoḽera kha zwiko izwi, zwine hezwi zwa ṋea fulufhelo ḽa uri hu na khonadzeo ya uri tshiwo itshi tsha khoḽera tshi nga vha tsho vha hone nga mulandu wa tshikafhadzwa ho bvelelaho fhethu huthihi fhedzi, lune zwiwo zwi re hone zwazwino zwa nga vha zwo vha hone nga mulandu wa tshikafhala ho vhangwaho nga zwiitisi zwa vhuvhili na zwa vhuraru (phiriselano).
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezogesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uzokwazisa izwe ngokuqaliswa koHlelo Lwezamandla ngoLwesihlanu, mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023, esithangamini sabezindaba..

src_text: Musi maga aya u lingedza tandulula thaidzo iyi tshi khou ḓi bvela phanḓa, vhadzulapo vha fhaḽa Hammanskraal vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha vhilise maḓi avho bommbini nahone vha shele na muṋo muṱuku phanḓa ha musi vha tshi nwa.
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Zwiṅwe hafhu, muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha na malani silingwa kana tsumbadwadze dza thaidzo ya tsukanyo tea uri nga ṱavhanya dalele dokotela wawe kana kiḽiniki ya henefho tsini nae..
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usesungule ikomidi lezobuchwepheshe, eliholwa nguMnyango Kazwelonke Wezempilo, njengendlela yokubhekana nokubheduka kwesifo sohudo e-Hammanskraal eDolobheni lase-Tshwane, esesithathe impilo yabantu abayi-15 ngomhla wama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili, Vho Senzo Mchunu, vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na Ṋeḓorobo wa Ḓorobo khulwane ya Tshwane, Mukhantseḽara Vho Cilliers Brink, nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023 itela lingedza bveledza pulane yo ṱanganelaho ya mushumo wa vusuluswa ha tshiimiswa tsha Rooiwal WWTW tshine tsho vha tsho tea tsho no vusuluswa kale itela wana zwidodombedzwa zwinzhi, vha nga founela kha nomboro ya luṱingo ya Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka (NICD) shumaho awara dza 24 nga ḓuvha kha 082 883.
Tsumbamaitele dza ilafha vhulwadze ha Khoḽera dzi wanala kha inthanethe kha www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka wokuhlolisisa yonke imisuka yokungcola, okungaba imithombo yamanzi, izimoto ezihambisa amanzi, izimpompi kanye nesihlanzimanzi i-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza Kotara (QLFS).
tgt_text: Kuze kube yimanje, abukho ubufakazi begciwane lesifo sohudo osebutholakele kule mithombo yamanzi, lokho okuqinisa ukuthi kungenzeka ukubheduka kwesifo sohudo kwasuka esigamekweni esisodwa sokungcola kwamanzi, njengoba izigameko zamanje zingenxa yokungcola okusuka kumuntu kuye komunye.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri QLFS ya thoma ya ṅwaha wa 2023 yo sumbedzisa uri ho vha na nyengedzedzo ya vhurathi ya nga kotara nga tevhekana kha tshivhalo tsha mishumo khathihi na uri zwa tholwa ha vhathu vha swikaho.
tgt_text: Njengoba kuqaliswa izindlela zokungenelela, abahlali base-Hammanskraal bayagqugquzelwa ukuthi babilise amanzi empompi futhi bafake ingcosana kasawoti ngaphambi kokuwaphuza.

src_text: 2 miḽioni zwi khou vhonala zwi tshi khou ri sendedzela tsini na uri ri swike kha tshivhalo tsha.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, noma ngubani ohanjiswa yisisu, ukucanuzela kwenhliziyo noma izimpawu zokuphathwa isisu kufanele avakashele udokotela wakhe ngokushesha noma umtholampilo wendawo..

src_text: 4 miḽioni tsha vhathu vho tholiwaho kha maḓuvha phanḓa ha tshiwo tsha dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle, uMnu Senzo Mchunu, uzohlangana noSodolobha weDolobha lase-Tshwane u-Cllr Cilliers Brink, ngoLwesihlanu mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023 emzamweni wokuqhamuka nesu elihlanganyelwe lokulungiswa osekudlulelwe isikhathi kwe-Rooiwal WWTW..

src_text: Hezwi zwi tou vha tsumbo re khagala ya uri ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe khou vhonala tshi khou vhuyelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho vhukuma bva kha masiandaitwa dwadze iḽo..
tgt_text: Ngemininingwane ethe xaxa ungashayela inombolo ephuthumayo esebenza ubusuku nemini yeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithelelanayo (i-NICD) ku-082 883.

src_text: Mbalombalo dza nga ha vhathu vhane vha khou shuma dza kotara ya thoma dzo sumbedza uri ho sikwa mishumo swikaho 209 000 kha sekhithara yo dzudzanyeaho ngeno miṅwe mishumo ya 107 000 yo sikwa kha sekhithara songo dzudzanyeaho kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya thoma ya ṅwaha..
tgt_text: Imihlahlandlela yokwelashwa kwesifo sohudo itholakala ngobuchwepheshe ku-www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: Vhushaka ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Amerika (US) .
tgt_text: UCwaningo Lwekota Lwabasebenzi (i-QLFS).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ombedzela zwauri vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Amerika vhu kha ḓi vha havhuḓi, ho khwaṱha nahone vhune ha vhuedza masia oṱhe swika zwino nga murahu ha muṱangano we wa vha hone vhukati ha Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhushaka ha Dzitshaka na Tshumisano, Dokotela Vho Naledi Pandor na Muambasada wa ḽa Amerika fhano Afrika Tshipembe, Vho Reuben Brigety, nga murahu ha maambiwa avho he khao vha vha vha tshi khou pomoka
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligqugquzelwa ukuthi i-QLFS yokuqala yangowezi-2023 ibonise ukukhula ngekota okulandelanayo kwenani lemisebenzi kanye nokuqashwa kwabantu abayizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe uri ḽo ṋetshedza zwiṱhavhane kha shango ḽa Russia.
tgt_text: 2 kusondela kancane kwinani eliyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela zwauri hu na nḓila dzi ḓivheaho dza zwa vhudipuḽomati dzine dza tea shumiswa nga tshaka dzoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa na shango ḽa US, kha bvisela khagala thaidzo dzine vha vha nadzo zwenezwo musi dzi tshi tutuwa kha zwa kulangelwe kwa vhushaka ha vhavhili.
tgt_text: 4 labantu abaqashwa ngaphambi kwezinsuku zokuhlasela kwegciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nḓivhadzo nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ya vhumbwa ha ṱhoḓisiso yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe ya ṱoḓisisa mavharivhari u ṋetshedzwa ha zwiṱhavhane zwi bvaho fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwi tshi ṋewa shango ḽa Russia.
tgt_text: Lokhu kucacisa bha ukuthi umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika ululama ngokuqinile kwimiphumela yalolu bhubhane.

src_text: Zwidodombedzwa zwa ṱhoḓisiso iyo zwi ḓo ḓivhadzwa musi tshifhinga tshi tshi swika.
Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Singapore.
tgt_text: Izibalo zemisebenzi zekota yokuqala zibonisa imisebenzi eyizi-209 000 eyasungulwa kumkhakha ohlelekile kanye nemisebenzi eyizi-107 000 kumkhakha ongahlelekile ngesikhathi sekota yokuqala yonyaka..

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho ṱanganedza Minisṱa Muhulwane wa Riphabuḽiki ya Singapore Vho Lee Hsien Loong nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Shundunthule..
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-United States (i-US) .

src_text: Shango ḽa Singapore ndi mubindudzi muhulwane fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, hune ha vha na vhubindudzi ha masheleni fhiraho R5 biḽioni kha sekhithara dzi fanaho na zwa vhumagi, tshumelo dza zwa masheleni na zwa ndaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuqinisekisile ukuthi ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-US busalokhu bubuhle, buqinile futhi womabili amazwe ayazuza kubona kulandela umhlangano phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe Wezobudlelwano Bamazwe Ngamazwe Nokubambisana, uDkt Naledi Pandor kanye neNxusa lase-US eliseNingizimu Afrika, uMnu Reuben Brigety, emva kwezinsolo zakhe zokuthi iNingizimu Afrika inikeze i-Russia izikhali..

src_text: Thendelano dzo sainwaho vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ndi dzine dzo livhiswa kha khwaṱhisa mbambadzo, vhubindudzi, pfunzo na tshumisano kha zwa vhupileli.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lagcizelela ukuthi izindlela ezisunguliwe zokuxhumana zamanxusa azo zonke izizwe zikhona, kubandakanya i-US, ukuzwakalisa izinkinga uma ziqubuka ekuphathweni kobudlelwano phakathi kwala mazwe womabili..
IKhabhinethi lamukele isimemezelo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kophenyo oluzimele oluzohlolisisa izinsolo zokuthi kwahanjiswa izikhali zisuka eNingizimu Afrika ziya e-Russia.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki tsha Kapa Vhukovhela (DDM).
tgt_text: Imininingwane yalolu phenyo izomenyezelwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi..

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya vhurathi ya nga ha DDM ya fhaḽa Kapa Vhukovhela, kha Masipala Wapo wa Drakenstein, kha Tshiṱiriki tsha Cape Winelands, nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 19 Shundunthule..
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-Singapore.

src_text: Phresidennde vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa vhu bvaho kha masia mararu muvhuso nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu Tei vha na Tsaleli”.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa usingathe uNgqongqoshe Wezwe u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhulikhi yase-Singapore ngoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNhlaba..

src_text: Imbizo iyi yo vha yo rangelwa phanḓa nga madalo Phresidennde kha vhupo vhu re henefho nga tsini ha Tshiṱuṱuwedzi tsha Mveledziso ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ha Vlakkeland, vhune ha vha vhupo vhuhulwanesa ha mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha tshitshavha swika zwino kha Masipala Wapo wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Izwe lase-Singapore lingabatshalizimali abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, nasebetshale izimali zenani eliphelele elingaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R5 emikhakheni efana neyokukhiqiza, izinsizakalo zezimali kanye nokuthengiswa kwezindlu.

src_text: Mveledziso ye ya thomiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2017 dzi ḓo ri musi dzi tshi khunyeledzwa, dza ṋetshedza madzulo swikala 2 556 kha vhathu vho teaho vhane vha tea vhuelwa.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezisayiniwe phakathi kwamazwe womabili zihlose ukuqinisa uhwebo, utshalomali, ezemfundo kanye nokubambisana kwezokuvikeleka.

src_text: Zwa fhaṱwa ha nnḓu dzi swikaho 942 kha Luṱa lwa Thoma zwazwino zwi kati, lune ho no khunyeledzwa dziṅwe dzi swikaho 454 ngeno dziṅwe dza 301 hu hone dzi tshi kha ḓi vha kati na fhaṱiwa.
tgt_text: IMbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Ndeme ya thandela iyi ndi ya uri ṋetshedza tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza dzinnḓu bva kha idzo dza avho vhane vha vha na muholo wa vhukati ha R0 swika R3 500 (nga fhasi ha Vula Nḓila Ntswa) ya kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Sabusidi ya Muthu Muthihi yo Ṱumanywaho na Masheleni, kha avho vhane vha hola muholo wa vhukati ha R3,501 na R22 000 nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa ubambe iMbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM yesithupha eNtshonalanga Kapa, kuMasipala Wendawo i-Drakenstein, kwiSifunda sase-Cape Winelands, ngoLwesihlanu ziyi-19 kuNhlaba..

src_text: Zwoṱhe zwikhala zwa Nnḓu dza zwa Matshilisano khathihi na zwikhala zwa Nnḓu dza Vhahali vha zwa Mmbi zwi wanala kha thandela iyi.
tgt_text: UMongameli uhole ithimba eliphuma kuzo zontathu izinhlaka zikahulumeni ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Asishiyi Muntu Ngemuva”.

src_text: Madalo Vhulavhelesi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa eThekwini na kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uMgungundlovu nga ḽa 18 na 19 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: IMbizo yandulelwa uhambo lukaMongameli lokuvakashela lapho kwakhiwa khona indawo yokuhlalisa abantu eseduze i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development, okuluhlelo olukhulu lokwakhiwa kwezindlu zomphakathi olwake lwaba khona kuze kube manje kuMasipala Wendawo i-Drakenstein.

src_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Paul Mashatile vho amba na vhathu vha kwameaho bva kha zwa pfunzo na vhugudisi, vhulimivhufuwi, makwevho na nḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho zwa vhulavhelesi fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa eThekwini na kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uMgungundlovu sa tshipiḓa tsha madalo vhulavhelesi DDM.
tgt_text: Ukwakhiwa okwaqala ngowezi-2017 kuzothi kungaphothulwa bese kuhlinzeka ngezindlu eziyi-2 556 kulabo abafanelekile.

src_text: Iṅwe ya thandela dza ndeme dze dza dalelwa, ho vha vhupo ha Thandela ya Tshanduko ya Ntshongweni, hune ha vha vhupo vhune khaho ha khou fhaṱiwa Ḓorobo yo Bveledzeaho kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi vhukati ha ḓorobo ya Durban na ya Pietermaritzburg.
Thandela iyi ḓo vusulusa mishumo ya zwa ikonomi kha vhupo honoho, lune ya ḓo ḓisa vhubindudzi vhu linganaho R15 biḽioni kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya 10 ya kha ya 15 ḓaho.
tgt_text: Ukwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingama-942 kweSigaba Sokuqala kuyaqhubeka, okuyizindlu ezingama-454 eseziphothuliwe kanye nezingama-301 ezisakhiwa.

src_text: Themamveledziso dza maḓi.
tgt_text: Ukubaluleka kwalo mklamo ukuthi ubhekelela izinhlelo zezindlu ezehlukahlukene kusuka kulabo abahola i-R0 kuya kwizi-R3 500 (ngaphansi KoHlelo Oludidiyelwe Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu), kuya kulabo abasoHlelweni Lokuxhaswa Ngezimali Zokuthenga Indlu, labo abahola phakathi kwezi-R3 501 kuya kwizi-R22 000 ngenyanga.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho dalela Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 23 Shundunthule 2023 he vha shela mulenzhe kha vhuṱambo ha vula Luṱa lwa 2 lwa thandela iyi.
tgt_text: Womabili amathuba Ezindlu Zomphakathi kanjalo namathuba ezindlu Zomakadebona Bezempi akhona kulo mklamo..

src_text: Sa thandela yo sainiwaho miṅwaha minzhi yo fhelaho nahone ya dovha ya vha na tshilengo, hovhu vhuṱambo ho sumbedza ndeme ya engedzwa ha luvhilo lwa shumiwa ha thandela iyi ine ya vha mushumo wa ndeme wa vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili.
tgt_text: UHambo Lokuyohlola Umsebenzi kuMasipala Wedolobha laseThekwini kanye noMasipala Wesifunda saseMgungundlovu mhla we-18 nomhla we-19 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Heyi Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands ndi ya ndeme kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, Free State, Mpumalanga, Devhula Vhukovhela na Kapa Devhula.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-Paul Mashatile uxoxisane nababambiqhaza kwezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa, ezolimo, ezentengiselwano kanye nezimboni ngesikhathi sohambo lokuyohlola umsebenzi kuMasipala Wedolobha laseThekwini kanye noMasipala Wesifunda saseMgungundlovu njengengxenye yokuhambela ukuhlola imisebenzi ye-DDM.

src_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi ha kha themamveledziso ya maḓi vhune ha ḓo khwinifhadza matshilo vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhu khou bvela phanḓa nga mukovho wa masheleni fhiraho R14 biḽioni kha mimasipala itela tandulula thaidzo dza salela murahu ha themamveledziso dza zwa maḓi, nga kha Gavhelo ḽa Themamveledziso ya Dzingu nga Vhunzhi (RBIG) khathihi na Gavhelo ḽa Themamveledziso ya Tshumelo dza zwa Maḓi (WSIG).
tgt_text: Enye yemiklamo ehamba phambili evakashelwe kube yindawo okwakhiwa kuyona i-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, lapho okwakhiwa khona iDolobha Lesimanjemanje phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu.

src_text: Masheleni RBIG ḓo shumiswa kha thandela dzi swikaho 130 ngeno ayo WSIG tshi ḓo kovhelwa kha thandela dzi fhiraho 400 mona na shango.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo uzovuselela imisebenzi efukula umnotho endaweni, nokufaka igalelo lotshalomali olubiza izigidigidi ezi-R15 eminyakeni eyi-10 kuya kweyi-15 ezayo..

src_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya pfa yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri Muhasho wa zwa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) khou vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa hune masheleni swikaho R600 miḽioni vha no badelwa murahu nga khamphani dze dza vhuelwa nga wana thendara dzi songo ḓaho nga ngona.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda yamanzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha maga ndangulo ya thivhela a vhewa nga muhasho itela fhelisa kushumisele kwa masheleni nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi, ine ya si vhe na mbuelo nahone nga nḓila ya tambisea.
tgt_text: UMongameli U-Ramaphosa uvakashele umklamo i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-23 kuNhlaba 2023 lapho abe yingxenye womcimbi wokuphendulwa kwesoyi leSigaba Sesibili somklamo.

src_text: Pfufho ya Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo owasayinwa eminyakeni eminingi eyadlula futhi wabambezeleka, lo mcimbi ubonisa ukubaluleka kokusheshiswa kwalo msebenzi obalulekile wala mazwe womabili.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ṱanganedza Pfufho ya Maitele Avhuḓi ya Dzangano ḽa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano ḽa Dzitshaka (ISSA) kha zwa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano Afrika kha ṅwaha wa 2023, ḽine ḽa dzhiela nṱha vhubindudzi ha muvhuso kha matshilo vhana vhashu, nga maanḓa avho vhane vha bva kha miṱa yo shayaho nahone songo tsireledzeaho.
tgt_text: Umklamo i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ubaluleke kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eNyakatho Ntshonalanga naseNyakatho Kapa..

src_text: Zwa dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu ha pfufho idzi dza maimo nṱha nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, zwo vha nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U engedzwa nga zwiṱuku ha magavhelo zwa matshilisano uri kone katela na vhana vha songo tsireledzeaho: Fhungo ḽa Magavhelo Thikhedzo ya Vhana, Afrika Tshipembe”.
tgt_text: Ukutshalwa kwezimali kwingqalasizinda yamanzi ukuze kuzothuthukiswa izimpilo zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuyaqhubeka njengoba kwatshelwe omasipala imali engaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R14 ukuthi babhekana nenkinga yokusilela emuva kwingqalasizinda yamanzi, ngokusebenzisa iSibonelelo Sengqalasizinda Yezifunda (i-RBIG) kanye neSibonelelo Sengqalasizinda Yezinsizakalo Zamanzi (i-WSIG).

src_text: Ho ṱanganedzwa khumbelo dza tama dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu bva kha zwiimiswa zwine zwa vha miraḓo zwi swikaho 48 zwa mashango fhiraho 30 dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: I-RBIG izosetshenziswa kwimiklamo eyi-130 bese kuthi i-WSIG yona izofakwa kwimiklamo engama-400 kulolonke izwe..

src_text: Thuso yashu ya zwa matshilisano ndi tshone tshidziki tsha mbekanyamushumo dza fhelisa vhushai dza muvhuso nahone ndi dza ndeme kha vhuisa tshirunzi tsha vhathu vhashu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lathokozela ukuthi uMnyango Wamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS) uthatha amagxathu ekulweni nenkohlakalo njengoba usuthole cishe izigidi ezingama-R600 ezikhokhwe yizinkampani ezazuza ngokuthola amathenda ngokungekho emthethweni.

src_text: Sisṱeme ya magavhelo matshilisano ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ndi iṅwe ya sisṱeme dzine dza vha khulwanesa ḽifhasini, lune ya vha na vhathu vhane vha khou tea vhuelwa vha fhiraho 18 miḽioni..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde laziphawula izinyathelo zokulawula ezibekwe ngumnyango zokuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwezimali okungahambisani nomthetho, okungenasidingo nokumoshayo.

src_text: Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama.
tgt_text: Indondo Yezokuvikeleka Komphakathi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama dza mihasho ya muvhuso dzi khou tshimbila zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ithole iNdondo Yomsebenzi Omuhle kwezoKuvikeleka Komphakathi e-Afrika ngowezi-2023 yeNhlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe Kwezokuvikeleka Komphakathi (i-ISSA), ebonisa ukubonga ukuzinikela kukahulumeni ezimpilweni zabantwana bethu, ikakhulukazi labo abaphuma emakhaya adla imbuya ngothi futhi abuthakathaka..

src_text: Sheduḽu ya Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama ine ya khou tevhela na nḓivhadzo dza tikedza dza vhoramafhungo:..
tgt_text: Isicelo sokungenela ukuthola le ndondo seNingizimu Afrika sasinesihloko esithi: “Ukwandiswa kancane kancane kokuvikeleka kwenhlalo yabantwana ababuthakathaka: Udaba lweSibonelelo Sabantwana, eNingizimu Afrika”.

src_text: Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023 nga awara ya 13:00, Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Tshumisano dza Mavhusele na Mafhungo Sialala (CoGTA), Mufumakadzi Vho Thembi Nkadimeng, vha ḓo ṋea muvhigo kha vhoramafhungo nga ha Vouthu ya Mugaganyagwama wa CoGTA une wa ḓo bvisela khagala maga livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa mashumele mimasipala.
tgt_text: Inani eliphelele lezicelo zokungenela ezamukelwa zazisuka ezikhungweni ezingamalungu ezingama-48 emazweni angaphezu kwama-30 e-Afrika..
Izibonelelo zethu zomphakathi zingummongo wohlelo lukahulumeni lokuqeda ububha futhi zingumnyombo wokubuyisa isithunzi sabantu bakithi.

src_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Shundunthule 2023, Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano, Mufumakadzi Vho Lindiwe Zulu khathihi na Minisṱa Vha Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Dzidzhele, Vho Ronald Lamola, vha ḓo ḓivhadza Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama khathihi na zwiṅwe zwidodombedzwa zwa mivhigo yavho ya vhoramafhungo zwi ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu...
tgt_text: Uhlelo lweNingizimu Afrika lokuvikela umphakathi luphakathi kwezinhlelo ezinkulukazi emhlabeni, njengoba lunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-18 abahlomula kulona.

src_text: Vouthu ya Mugaganyagwama wa Ofisi ya Phresidennde ḓo ṋetshedzwa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 31 Shundunthule 2023 ngeno muvhigo wa vhoramafhungo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha Tshanduko ya Milayo khathihi na Maga zwa Mishumo ane tshimbidzwa nga Operation Vulindlela tshi ḓo farwa nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Shundunthule.
Vhuṱambo ha vhu20 ha Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika na Maitele Tsenguluso ya Vhuthihi ha Afrika (APRM).
tgt_text: Amavoti Ezabelomali.

src_text: Khabinethe khathihi na vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afika Tshipembe khou vha luthihi na dzhango ḽoṱhe ḽa Afrika khathihi na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga angaredza kha pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 25 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyathokoza ukuthi amaVoti Ezabelomali eminyango kahulumeni aqhubeka kahle.

src_text: Uno ṅwaha ndi wa ndeme vhukuma sa izwi ṅwaha wa pembelela miṅwaha ya 60 bva tshe ha sainwa thendelanomviswa ya tumbulwa ha Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Afrika, ḽine ḽa vha ḽone ḽo rangelaho Mbumbano ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lwamaVoti Ezabelomali azayo kanye nezithangami zabezindaba:..

src_text: Thero ya vhuṱambo ha ṅwaha wa 2023 ndi ine ya ri “U Ṱavhanyedza Thoma Shumiswa ha Vhupo ha Mbambadzo dzo Vhofholowaho ha Dzhango ḽa Afrika” – dzhiela nṱha ndingedzo dzine dza khou itwa kha zwa thoma shuma ha vhupo ha mbambadzo yo vhofholowaho vhu hulwanesa ḽifhasini..
tgt_text: NgoLwesihlanu mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023 ngehora le-13:00, uNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zendabuko (i-CoGTA), uNks Thembi Nkadimeng, uzobamba isithangami sabezindaba mayelana neVoti leSabelomali elizocacisa izinyathelo okuhloswe ngazo ukuqinisa ukusebenza komasipala.

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha pembelela Ṅwedzi wa Afrika ha ṋaṅwaha, vhu khou vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi khou pembelelwa miṅwaha ya 20 ya APRM, ine yo livhiswa kha ṱuṱuwedza mavhusele avhuḓi kha dzhango ḽoṱhe nga kha maitele u gudisana na sengulusana nga tshashu
Tsheo dza Khabinethe .
tgt_text: NgoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNhlaba 2023, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi, uNks Lindiwe Zulu, kanye noNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa Nokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, bazoba namaVoti Ezabelomali kanti imininingwane yezithangami zabezindaba izokhishwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi...

src_text: Vhupo ha zwa Ikonomi ho Khetheaho (SEZ) ha Namakwa.
tgt_text: IVoti Lesabelomali leHhovisi likaMongameli lizokwethulwa ngoLwesithathu, mhla wama-31 kuNhlaba 2023 kanti isithangami sabezindaba ngeNqubekelaphambili Yezinguquko Zezakhiwo kanye Nemizamo Yokusungula Imisebenzi ehlanganiswa ngohlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela sizoba ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa tiwa ha vhupo ha Namakwa SEZ vhu re ngei Aggeneys kha ḽa Kapa Devhula tiiwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu khou itwa ya nga Mulayo wa Vhupo ho Khetheaho ha zwa Ikonomi, wa ṅwaha wa 2014 (Mulayo 16 wa 2014) nahone iyo SEZ ine ya khou dzinginywa ndi tshipiḓa tsha Fulo ḽa zwa Vhubindudzi ḽa Phresidennde.
tgt_text: USuku Lwe-Afrika kanye nokubungaza iminyaka engama-20 yeNdlela Yokuhlolana Kwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Hovhu vhupo ha Namakwa SEZ vhu ḓo vula zwikhala zwa mbuelo kha zwa migodi, vhubveledzi ha geseluḓi dala, vhubveledzi ha themamveledziso, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho na zwa shandukiswa ha zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwa vha zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi nabobonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bahlanganyele nezwekazi lase-Afrika nomhlaba wonke ukubungaza uSuku lwe-Afrika ngoLwesine, mhla wama-25 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Hedzi sekhithara ndi dza ndeme kha sikwa ha mishumo khathihi na mveledziso ya ikonomi ya vhupo ha Kapa Devhula khathihi na shango nga angaredza..
tgt_text: Lo nyaka ubalulekile ikakhulukazi njengoba uluphawu lokuphela kweminyaka engama-60 kwasayinwa isisekelo somqulu weNhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika, eyandulela uBumbano Lwamazwe Ase-Afrika.

src_text: Vhubindudzi ha masheleni fhiraho R29 biḽioni ho no ḓi fulufhedziswa swika zwino kha luṱa lwa thoma lwa SEZ.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo semibungazo yangowezi-2023 esithi - “Ukusheshisa Ukuqaliswa Kokuhwebelana Ngaphandle Kokukhokha Intela Kwamazwe Asezwenikazini i-Afrika” – sibonisa amagxathu athathwayo ekuqaliseni ukusebenza kwale nkundla yokuhweba enkulukazi emhlabeni..

src_text: Hezwi zwi katela pfulufhedziso bva kha vha Vedanta Zinc (R16 biḽioni), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 biḽioni), Hive Energy (R200 miḽioni) na RRS Trade and Investment (R100 miḽioni)..
tgt_text: Umbungazo weNyanga ye-Afrika wakulo nyaka uqondane nokuphela kweminyaka engama-20 ye-APRM, okuhloswe ngako ukuqinisa ukubusa kahle ezwenikazini ngokulandela izindlela zokuthi izwe lifunde kwelinye izwe futhi aphinde ahlolane wona

src_text: Luṱa lwa Vhuraru lwa Maano Zwiko zwa Maḓi zwa Lushaka (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza NWRS-3 2023 uri ithome shumiswa nahone maano aya ndi ane vha mbofho kha maanḓalanga na zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou shumisa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: INdawo Yomnotho Okhethekile (i-SEZ) e-Namakwa.

src_text: Haya maano dzudzanywa hu tshi tevhedzwa tsenguluso ya miṅwaha miraru ya NWRS-2, ine ya vha yone ye ya ṱalusa masia ane ha vha na mvelaphanḓa khathihi na ayo ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukubekwa kwe-SEZ e-Namakwa e-Aggeneys eNyakatho Kapa.

src_text: NWRS-3 yo vhumbwa nga zwipikwa zwiraru zwine zwa elana, zwine masia maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili tea tikedza mveledziso yazwo fheliswa ha vhushai na tshayandingano shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi na sika mishumo, na uri maḓi tea tsireledzwa shumiswa bveledziswa ṱhogomelwa na langwa nga nḓila ine nga vha hone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone nga nḓila linganaho.
tgt_text: Lesi sethulo sokubekwa senziwe ngokwemigomo yoMthetho Wezindawo Zomnotho Okhethekile, wezi-2014 (uMthetho we-16 wezi-2014) futhi i-SEZ eyethuliwe iyingxenye yoMkhankaso KaMongameli Wotshalomali.
I-SEZ yase-Namakwa izovula amathuba okuhlomula ezimayini, ukukhiqizwa kwehayidrojini ehlanzekile, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingqalasizinda, ugesi ovuselelekayo kanye nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

src_text: Haya maano dzinginya makumedzwa pfalaho u engedza nḓisedzo ya maḓi fhungudza ṱhoḓea ya maḓi, ndangulo yavhuḓi ya maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili langa sekhithara ya maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili ṋetshedza hafhu maḓi hu tshi itelwa tshanduko ṱuṱuwedza tshumisano ya dzitshaka langa maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili nga fhasi ha kilima ine ya khou shanduka..
tgt_text: Le mikhakha ibaluleke kakhulu ekusungulweni kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa komnotho waseNyakatho Kapa nowezwe.

src_text: Heyi NWRS-3 anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya DWS ine ya vha www.dws.gov.za..

Muvhigo wa nga ha maga thomaho shumiswa nga Muhasho wa zwa Vhupileli (DoD) hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza mikhwa na vhuḓifari ha miraḓo ya Mmbi ya Vhupileli ha Lushaka ya Afrika Tshipembe (SANDF) vhane vha vha vho rumelwa kha mishumo ya ḓisa mulalo..
tgt_text: Lungaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingama-R29 utshalomali oseluvele luthenjisiwe esigabeni sokuqala se-SEZ.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ine shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽa khou ita hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza vhuḓifari ha miṅwe miraḓo ya SANDF ine ya vha yo rumelwa kha mishumo ya ḓisa mulalo mona na dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya izithembiso eziphuma ku-Vedanta Zinc (izigidigidi eziyi-R16), e-Frontier Rare Earth (izigidigidi eziyi-R13), e-Hive Energy (izigidi ezingama-R200) kanye nase-RRS Trade and Investment (izigidi eziyi-R100)..

src_text: SANDF yo ḓi dzulela vhonala sa tshiko tsha ḓihudza ha lushaka sa izwi tshi shela mulenzhe kha vhurumelwa ha ḓisa mulalo kha dzhango ḽa Afrika itela uri hu vhe na mulalo na vhudziki kha dzitshaka dzine dza vha dzo hoṱefhadzwa nga dzinndwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika tshi khou shuma nga fhasi ha Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshakha (UN)..
tgt_text: UShicilelo Lwesithathu Lweqhingasu Likazwelonke Lwezinsiza Zamanzi (i-NWRS-3) lwangowezi-.

src_text: Musi hu tshi vha na mavharivhari milandu ya zwa vhudzekani nga ṅwaha wa 2015, ho mbo ḓi vhumbwa Tshigwada tsha shuma tsha Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela uri hu kone ṱoḓisiswa milandu iyi ya sa fara zwavhuḓi na tambudza lwa vhudzekani (SEA) ine ya bvelela ngomu kha DoD..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze i-NWRS-3 yangowezi-2023 ukuthi iqaliswe futhi leli qhingasu liphoqa zonke iziphathimandla kanye nezikhungo ezisebenzisa uMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998)..

src_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mutevhe wa maga a vhewa itela tandulula thaidzo dza zwiito zwa SEA ngomu kha vhurumelwa ha ḓisa mulalo ha SANDF.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lakhiwe ngokubuyekezwa kweminyaka emithathu ye-NWRS-2, okuveze izindawo lapho kube nempumelelo khona kanye nezindawo ezisanenselele.

src_text: Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka ḽi dzhia shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa ḽine ḽa vha na maitele khwinesa nahone ḽo fhululedza shango ḽashu kha mvelaphanḓa ye ḽa ita kha nndwa ya fhelisa tshoṱhe zwiito zwa SEA ngomu kha SANDF.
Khabinethe yo ombedzela uri zwiito zwa SEA zwi nga ḓo konḓelelwa uri zwi bvele phanḓa na tshinyadza rekhodo yavhuḓi ine SANDF ya vha nayo kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 iqukethe izinhlosonqangi ezintathu, zokuthi ezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle kufanele zeseke ukuthuthukiswa, ukuqedwa kobubha nokungalingani, zifake igalelo emnothweni nasekusungulweni kwemisebenzi, futhi amanzi kufanele avikelwe, asetshenziswe, athuthukiswe, aphathwe futhi alawulwe ngokusimeme nangokulingana..

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U engedza mbofholowo ya vhaswa kha zwa ikonomi hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu”.

src_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Mashatile vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi nga Ḓuvha ḽa Lushaka ḽine kha uno ṅwaha ḽa ḓo pembelelwa lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha mavhili bva nga ḽa 16 swika 17 Fulwi 2023 fhaḽa Sentharani ya zwa Mitambo ya nga Nnḓa ya Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kha ḽa Free State.
tgt_text: Umbiko ngezinyathelo eziqaliswe nguMnyango Wezokuvikeleka (i-DoD) ukubhekana nendlela yokuziphatha kwamalungu oMbutho Wezokuvikeleka Kuzwelonke eNingizimu Afrika (i-SANDF) atshalwe kwimisebenzi yokuletha ukuthula.

src_text: Kha tshenetshi tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha mararu, hu ḓo vha na tshikhala tshine ngatsho vhaswa vha ḓo kona shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano na Dziminisṱa, Vhathusaminisṱa khathihi na vhaṅwe vhashelamulenzhe vha kwameaho nga ha vhugudisi ho fhambanaho, zwikhala zwa mabindu na zwa mveledziso zwine zwa vha hone kha muvhuso na vhashumisani kha zwa matshilele..

Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ḓo rwelwa ṱari nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 1 Fulwi nga Minisṱa Ofisini ya Phresidennde vho hweswaho maanḓa Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali, Dokotela Vho Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma fhaḽa kha vhupo ha tshiga tsha Tshihumbudzi tsha Hector Pieterso na Muziamu tshi re fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko ngenqubekelaphambili eyenziwa iNingizimu Afrika ekubhekaneni nendlela yokuziphatha kwamanye amalungu e-SANDF atshalwe kwimisebenzi yokugcina ukuthula kulolonke izwekazi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo eletshedza tshitshavha uri tshi engedze mafulufulu itela vhona uri vhathu vhaswa vha khou kona swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha tendela uri vha kone ḓidzhenisa kha zwa shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.
tgt_text: I-SANDF ibilokhu ingumthombo wokuzigqaja kwesizwe njengoba iyingxenye yemisebenzi yokugcina ukuthula ezwenikazini eletha uzinzo nokuthula ezizweni zase-Afrika ezibambene ngempi ngosizo lweZizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN)..

src_text: Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwanesa, wo fhindula kha ṱhoḓea dza mveledziso ya zwikili na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa nga ita uri vhaswa vho fhedzaho pfunzo dzavho dza dziyunivesithi vhane vha si vhe na mishumo vha kone wana tshenzhemo ya mishumo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhugudi na Vhugudisi ha Mishumo ya avho vho fhedzaho pfunzo dza Yunivesithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Mayelana nezinsolo zamacala ezocansi abandakanya abagcini bokuthula bombutho wezokuvikeleka ezaqubuka ngowezi-2015, iThimba loNgqongqoshe lasungulwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze lizophenyisisa amacala okuxhashazwa nokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi (i-SEA) ngaphakathi e-DoD.

src_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano, Social Employment Fund (SEF) khathihi na maga u sika mishumo Tshumelo dza Vhaswa dza Lushaka (NYS) vusuluswaho nahone ane kona kungedzela vhaswa vha zwigidi na zwigidi ngomu kha ikonomi.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithokozile ngeqoqo lezinyathelo ezibekiwe ukubhekana nezehlakalo ze-SEA kwimisebenzi ye-SANDF yokugcina ukuthula.

src_text: Maga Mishumo ya Vhaswa Phresidennde na one no ḓi kona tikedza vhaswa kha kona swikela zwikhala zwi swikaho.
tgt_text: I-UN iyayibonga iNingizimu Afrika ngokwenza kahle futhi yancoma leli lizwe ngenqubekelaphambili eliyenzile ngokuqeda i-SEA kwi-SANDF..

src_text: 5 miḽioni zwine ngazwo vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou kona wana miholo ya tshifhinganyana vhewa ha vhaswa kha mishumo swikaho miḽioni nthihi, zwikhala zwa guda zwi katelaho na mishumo zwa 250 000 khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa 250 000 zwa tshumelo dzi badelaho hu tshi katelwa na vhaswa vha swikaho 500 000 vhane vho dzheniswa kha zwikhala zwa muholo wa tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligcizelele ukuthi izenzo ze-SEA ngeke zimukeleke ukudicilela phansi umlando omuhle we-SANDF ezwenikazini.

src_text: Musi ri tshi khou dzhena kha Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa, muvhuso khou eletshedza vhathu vhaswa uri vha ḓiṅwalise kha puḽatifomo ya SAYouth.mobi , ine ya vha puḽatifomo ine khayo vha nga kona swikela zwikhala zwa mishumo sa izwi vhaṅwe ngavho vha swikaho miḽioni nṋa vho no ḓiṅwalisa swika zwino farwa ha Muṱangano wa zwa Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhulimi fhano Afrika (FARA), Khonifarentsi ya vhumalo (8) ya Mabindu zwa Vhulimi Afrika na Vhege ya Saintsi khathihi na Guvhangano ḽa Nnyi na Nnyi ḽa vhu..

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa PSC wa ṅwaha wa 2023 itela vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ziphinde zibheke izinkinga ezaphakanyiswa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ezamemezela izigaba ezithile zoMthetho we-IPID wezi-2011 njengezingekho emthethweni, ezinika uNgqongqoshe Wezamaphoyisa igunya lokumisa emsebenzini uMqondisi Omkhulu, ukuthatha izinyathelo zokuqondisa uMqondisi Omkhulu izigwegwe kulandela ukumiswa emsebenzini, kanye nokukhipha uMqondisi Omkhulu ehhovisi.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu phumula Mulayo wa PSC, wa ṅwaha wa 1997 (Mulayo 46 wa 1997) wa Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe, wa.

tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza inqubo engafihli lutho futhi esobala yokuqashwa koMqondisi Omkhulu kanye nenqubo ecacile nephelele yokuhlolwa kokwethembeka kwabasebenzi be-IPID.

src_text: Mulayotibe ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha thomiwa ha khethekanyo ya vhuṅwaleli ho ḓiimisaho ha PSC hu tshi itelwa khwaṱhisa zwa ḓiimisa nga ndoṱhe na sa dzhia sia ha dzangano.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa uphinde uhlinzeke ngezichibiyelo zezinye izigaba zoMthetho Omkhulu, ukuze kuzoqinisekiswa ukuthi i-IPID yenza umsebenzi owunikiwe ngendlela efanele nangempumelelo.

src_text: Musi Mulayotibe wo no phasiswa uri vhe mulayo, mushumo wa PSC vho ḓo engedzwa ya na kha mimasipala khathihi na zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso.
